title: Teeth Whitening
shortDescription: Professional whitening for a brighter, confident smile.
fullDescription: Our professional teeth whitening treatments use advanced techniques to safely remove years of staining, giving you a noticeably brighter smile in just one visit. We use premium whitening gels and LED acceleration technology to deliver results up to 8 shades whiter.

title: Dental Implants
shortDescription: Permanent tooth replacement that looks and feels natural.
fullDescription: Dental implants provide a permanent solution for missing teeth. Our titanium implants fuse with your jawbone, creating a stable foundation for custom-made crowns that match your natural teeth perfectly.

title: Braces & Orthodontics
shortDescription: Straighten your teeth for a perfect, aligned smile.
fullDescription: We offer traditional braces and modern clear aligners to correct misaligned teeth. Our orthodontic treatments are customized for children, teens, and adults, ensuring comfortable and effective results.

title: Dental Veneers
shortDescription: Custom porcelain shells for a flawless smile transformation.
fullDescription: Porcelain veneers are thin, custom-made shells that cover the front surface of teeth, correcting chips, stains, and gaps for a picture-perfect smile. Our veneers are crafted with precision for a natural, luminous appearance.

title: Root Canal Treatment
shortDescription: Pain-free treatment to save infected teeth.
fullDescription: Our gentle root canal therapy removes infected pulp tissue, relieves pain, and saves your natural tooth. Modern techniques and advanced anesthesia ensure a comfortable, anxiety-free experience.

title: Smile Makeover
shortDescription: Complete smile transformation tailored to you.
fullDescription: A smile makeover combines multiple cosmetic procedures to achieve your ideal smile. We create a personalized treatment plan including whitening, veneers, and contouring based on your unique goals.
